preqs: ATS3008, ATS3028, ATS3010, ATS3030 or by permission.

rules.ruleString: For commencement date before `01-JAN-2014` Do Must have passed an (I/W) unit in {ATS1008, ATS1028, ATS2008, ATS2028, ATS3008, ATS3028, CHI2080, CHI2908, CHI3080, CHI3908} Otherwise Must have passed an (I/W) unit in {ATS3008, ATS3010, ATS3028, ATS3030}
Incompatible with achievement in (I/W) {ATS3029, ATS4009, ATS4029}

unitName: Chinese studies advanced 3: Readings in modern literature
description: Building on and consolidating work completed in previous Chinese studies, this unit will introduce students to a range of literary writings by master writers of modern China (1920s - 1940s).  Through critical analysis students are expected to improve their understanding of the tremendous social, political, and cultural changes in modern China resulting from the 1911 Revolution.
